text: Bojan Globočnik (born 26 February 1962) is a Slovenian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill event at the 1984 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Yugoslavia Category:Ski jumpers at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Kranj
title: Bojan Globočnik
